resources.string: When you share a text with links, do it through this app (choose \"URL Lengthener\" from the list of share target). \nThe app searches URLs in the shared text and replaces them with longer versions and then shares the modified text again. So then the share targets list appears again, choose the actual target now. \nNote the app requires Internet access, otherwise URLs stay unmodified.
Remove query part of URLs for specified domains
Click first link on a page of specified domains
